Sodium Lauryl Sulfate.description: Strong detergent and foaming agent that removes oils and dirt
Sodium Lauryl Sulfate.origin: Synthetic, derived from coconut or palm oil
Sodium Lauryl Sulfate.human-safety: Can be irritating to skin and eyes in high concentrations; generally safe in small amounts
Sodium Lauryl Sulfate.environment-safety: Can be toxic to aquatic life; biodegrades slowly
